column3: Latest;Preah Sihanouk:------Â On the morning of December 25
column5: a dolphin weighing about 200 kg was found dead on the beach under the Koh Puos Bridge in Sihanoukville.------The marine mammal measured 2.30 m and was identified as an ------Indo-Pacific humpback dolphin------
column6: which are found off the coast and around the island of Koh Rong and the archipelago.------These rare animals are protected by Sub-Decree No.123
column7: and this one is believed to have been killed after being caught in fishing nets.------Fisheries officials later buried the carcass. ------POST NEWS
